Items.Comment: I admit, I'm not a huge musical guy, and while I did love La La Land and mildly liked Les Miserables, musicals were never my genre. However, this trailer completely blew me away. The cast itself is unbelievable with actors like Hugh Jackman, Michelle Williams, Rebecca Ferguson, and Zac Efron, and everything from the visuals to the music was just uplifting and incredible. While I hate it when modern pop music is put into movie trailers, this is one of those times where it actually worked. I honestly can't wait to see this now that I have this and Star Wars to look forward to.
